title: Beseba gwjwn gaoni swrgwpuri khou
lyrics:
Beseba gwjwn gaoni swrgwpuri khou
Nagarnan fwibai nwng papi buhumao -2
Dukhu swibai papifwrni thakwi
Alai jabai krush sayao
(A)
Raobw gwiya be buhum bicayao
Mwdwi hugarnw Porbu nwngni duhkuao -2
Dersin sanbai gaswi gaoni dukhukhou
Gwjaolangbai gaswi nongkhai lamajwng
Muluk subung-a , gwjan eraibai
(B)
Raobw naihora nwngi krush bannai khou
Gwja thwijwng bwhwifanai  dukhukhou -2
Dai gwiwi nwngni thwini nijira
Papi subunga dinwi nwngkhou fwthaia
Muluk subung-a , gwjan eraibai
